subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur has two shutouts in three games since returning and now has 100 shutouts in his 15-year career, three short of Terry Sawchuk’s N.H.L. record.
snippet: Martin Brodeur has two shutouts in three games since returning and now has 100 shutouts in his 15-year career, three short of Terry Sawchuk’s N.H.L. record.
